chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: And now we will talk about the list.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: List is very important in HTML.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: Because we will use the list a lot.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: There are three types of lists in HTML.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: We have an ordered list, an unordered list and a definition list.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: The most used unordered and ordered list.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: Let's see the unordered list first.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: Sometimes we want to have unordered data.

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: Like I write here UL.

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5
chunks.text: So here it will be 1, 2, 3.

chunks.title: sample5

chunks.title: sample5
